rounds.comments: (Alex: Of course - that's what it is!)

clues.text: The second U.S. satellite in orbit, Vanguard I, blasted off from this Florida site March 17, 1958

One of the 3 Bs, he wrote "Hungarian Dances" while Liszt wrote "Hungarian Rhapsodies"

rounds.text: Once a drama critic in his native Dublin, he toured the U.S. as an actor's manager, but never visited Romania
